# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/urllib3/exceptions.py
@source-hash: d0c9e7a372874cd7
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:12Z

## Purpose
Exception hierarchy for urllib3 HTTP client library. Provides structured error handling with base classes, specific error types, and pickling support for distributed systems.

## Exception Hierarchy

### Base Classes
- `HTTPError (L8-11)`: Root exception for all urllib3 errors
- `HTTPWarning (L14-17)`: Root warning class for urllib3 warnings
- `PoolError (L20-30)`: Base for connection pool-related errors with pool reference and pickling support
- `RequestError (L32-42)`: Extends PoolError with URL association for request-specific errors

### Connection & Transport Errors
- `SSLError (L44-47)`: SSL certificate validation failures
- `ProxyError (L50-56)`: Proxy connection failures, stores original error
- `TimeoutError (L110-117)`: Base timeout error, catches both read and connect timeouts
- `ConnectTimeoutError (L128-131)`: Socket timeout during connection establishment
- `ReadTimeoutError (L120-123)`: Socket timeout while receiving data (inherits from both TimeoutError and RequestError)
- `NewConnectionError (L134-137)`: Failed connection establishment (usually ECONNREFUSED)

### Pool Management Errors
- `EmptyPoolError (L140-143)`: No available connections in pool
- `ClosedPoolError (L146-149)`: Request to closed pool
- `MaxRetryError (L77-93)`: Maximum retry attempts exceeded, includes reason and custom message formatting

### URL & Parsing Errors
- `LocationValueError (L152-155)`: Invalid URL input (inherits from ValueError and HTTPError)
- `LocationParseError (L158-166)`: URL parsing failures, stores original location
- `URLSchemeUnknown (L168-176)`: Unsupported URL scheme, stores scheme value
- `HostChangedError (L95-102)`: Pool accessed with foreign host URL

### Protocol & Data Errors
- `ProtocolError (L64-67)`: Unexpected mid-request/response issues
- `DecodeError (L58-61)`: Content-Type based decoding failures
- `ResponseNotChunked (L230-233)`: Response not chunked when chunks expected
- `IncompleteRead (L245-261)`: Content-Length mismatch, optimized for streaming (custom __repr__)
- `InvalidChunkLength (L263-278)`: Malformed chunk length in chunked responses
- `InvalidHeader (L280-283)`: Malformed HTTP headers
- `HeaderParsingError (L312-318)`: Header parsing issues with defect details

### Body Handling Errors
- `BodyNotHttplibCompatible (L236-242)`: Body lacks required fp attribute for chunked reading
- `UnrewindableBodyError (L320-323)`: Body rewind operation failed

### Security Warnings
- `SecurityWarning (L185-188)`: Base for security-related warnings
- `SubjectAltNameWarning (L191-194)`: Missing SAN in certificates
- `InsecureRequestWarning (L197-200)`: Unverified HTTPS requests
- `SystemTimeWarning (L203-206)`: Suspected incorrect system time
- `InsecurePlatformWarning (L209-212)`: Missing TLS/SSL platform support
- `SNIMissingWarning (L215-218)`: HTTPS without SNI support

### Proxy-Specific Errors
- `ProxySchemeUnknown (L286-304)`: Invalid proxy scheme with special localhost handling
- `ProxySchemeUnsupported (L306-309)`: HTTPS through HTTPS proxy not supported

### Special Cases
- `ConnectionError (L71)`: Backward compatibility alias for ProtocolError
- `TimeoutStateError (L104-107)`: Invalid timeout state transitions
- `ResponseError (L178-183)`: Container for MaxRetryError reasons with predefined message templates
- `DependencyWarning (L221-227)`: Missing optional dependencies

## Key Patterns
- Multiple inheritance used strategically (e.g., ReadTimeoutError, LocationValueError)
- Custom pickling support in pool-related exceptions via `__reduce__`
- Backward compatibility maintained through aliases
- Rich error context preservation (URLs, pools, original errors)
- Optimized streaming support in IncompleteRead
